content: Wait for Vite project initialization (package.json must exist)
Install TailwindCSS dependencies: npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer
Configure tailwind.config.js to include React files in content array
Update src/index.css to include Tailwind directives
Install ShadCN CLI: npx shadcn-ui@latest init
Configure ShadCN with TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and appropriate settings
Install basic ShadCN components: npx shadcn-ui@latest add button card input label
